entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
